jcr:content.jcr:description: Altra co-founded the Breaking Stigma in Stride 5K, which benefited the Still I Runâ€™s Starting Line Scholarship. Learn more about this virtual event!
jcr:content.jcr:title: Still I Run

overlayImage.altText: Still I Run x Altra logos

text.text:
JOIN US VIRTUALLY FOR THE BREAKING STIGMA IN STRIDE 5K ON JANUARY 1

Give the stigmas surrounding mental health a run for their money and sign up to run the Breaking the Stigma in Stride 5k. This virtual event is our way to raise money and awareness for mental health, and show people how joining together can make a difference. All proceeds will go to the Still I Runâ€™sStarting Line Scholarship.

MAKE AN IMPACT WITHOUT BREAKING A SWEAT

Discover all the ways you can donate to Still I Run, even if you canâ€™t join us for the virtual 5k.

image.alt: Still I Run logo with the words "runners for mental health awareness" below it

text.text: Still I Run is a community of runners that rally together to help people take control of their mental health. They strive to build a community of solidarity so those with mental illness can feel supported, and know they are not alone. Their mission i to promote the benefits of running for mental health and work together to defeat the stigmas surrounding mental health issues.
